text: Herbert is a fictional character in the animated television series Family Guy. He is voiced by Mike Henry, who created and designed the character. Herbert is an elderly neighbor of the Griffin family who first appeared in the season 3 episode "To Love and Die in Dixie". He has a sexual love interest for Chris Griffin, though the Griffins and the citizens of Quahog ignore the fact. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Family Guy characters Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2001
title: Herbert (Family Guy)
